```{r}
articles <- list.files(path = ".", pattern = "\\.md$")
for (i in articles){
  temp <- readLines(i, warn = F)
  imgPos <- regexpr("　",temp) # {% asset_img %}
  
  if (all(imgPos < 0)){
    next
  }
  
  temp[min(which(imgPos > 0))] <- gsub("　", "",temp[min(which(imgPos > 0))])
  writeLines(temp, i)
}
```
